steps.title: Enter the Town Hall.
steps.content: Enter the Town Hall. It is represented by a blue icon on the touchscreen. It can be found between the apartments and houses. Click on its icon twice, or click on it once and press the orange Enter button.

steps.title: Press Options.
steps.content: Press Options . This icon is found at the bottom right of the screen, below QR Code and has a picture of a spanner.

steps.title: Choose the Delete Save Data option.
steps.content: Choose the Delete Save Data option. It is written in red text and is found at the bottom right, below Sound Settings and beside Baby Settings .

steps.title: Make your decision.
steps.content: Make your decision. A warning reminding you that this will delete all your progress will pop up. If you are sure, press Yes , if you aren't press No . You can always come back and delete it later.

steps.title: Select Yes again.
steps.content: Select Yes again. You will be greeted by a message saying "Do you really want to delete everything?" you have the option to select Yes or No . You will be asked the same question twice. This is your last chance to change your mind.

steps.title: Enter your island's name.
steps.content: Enter your island's name. If you do not get your island's name correct, it will not let you delete your island. Once you enter your island's name, your island will be deleted.
